e1f10ebb-7cf2-4a48-9635-913f5dd136c6.name: 仆从
e1f10ebb-7cf2-4a48-9635-913f5dd136c6.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

71c8319f-77f4-4f59-b48b-f7f6b7036562.name: 感同身受
71c8319f-77f4-4f59-b48b-f7f6b7036562.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

e2421faf-a794-4854-966c-7a593401506f.name: 感同身受
e2421faf-a794-4854-966c-7a593401506f.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

29818641-436c-4637-8112-00878e92226b.name: 感同身受
29818641-436c-4637-8112-00878e92226b.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

5c43e000-37e4-4783-8996-ccb40979e664.name: 感同身受
5c43e000-37e4-4783-8996-ccb40979e664.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

f9c825d1-9dac-420b-88df-61386e98be2d.name: 健康
f9c825d1-9dac-420b-88df-61386e98be2d.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

d73cf094-b9f0-4241-a6e4-e9a5d1aa0737.name: Fit, Very
d73cf094-b9f0-4241-a6e4-e9a5d1aa0737.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

ff588f2c-3218-45e6-9cda-9eecf9253a41.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

0a9a2e14-181c-4c58-ab5b-d4c3f0abad36.name: 可选增益
0a9a2e14-181c-4c58-ab5b-d4c3f0abad36.notes: 在天赋对应的技能检定失败后的避免遭受伤害的 HT 检定上获得加值

b46fc512-e477-459a-abac-36267ec73bc2.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

c669b151-1f80-43c1-84ff-13a45da96fc7.name: Have three Primary Skills. Two Guns skills at [4] each and one more primary skill.
